nodes.title: chore: some lintings and suggested simplifications
perf: upgrade to use proto3
chore: upgrade crashreporter dependency 4.1.0 -> 4.2.0
chore: remove internal ai system for engine
refactor: do light merging later, remove ChunkProcessingPipeline
chore: replace drain with poll for queue for GameThread
perf: minor adjusments to chunkprocessing pipeline
perf: replace creating streams by arrays in stream
chore: remove unused render utilities
fix(autoconfig): fix back-animation to empty screen
chore: minor fixes and introduce some test cases for VertexResource
chore: add test cases for IndexResource and address some problems found through test cases
chore: cleanup extra qualification for org.joml from termath migration
chore: remove deprecated Chunk#getPosition(Vector3i)
chore: remove deprecated LegacyGsonTypeHandlerAdapter
chore(PathManager): remove some "probably isn't needed anymore" code
build(IntelliJ): turn on checkstyle.scan-before-checkin
bugfix: migrate deprecated texture2D
refactor: split chunkMesh to ChunkMeshImpl
refactor: construct block mesh generator single shape with standard mesh data
fix(PathManager): working directory should always be a fallback
refactor: refactor mesh generation for IconMeshFactory
fix(rendering): replicate SkeletalMesh fields, fix debug skeleton scale
feat(gestaltv7-eventsystem): Migration Event and @ReceiveEvent to gestalt's
ci: fail checkstyle on all findings except warning.LOW
feat: expand attribute scheme to allow combining meshdata
chore(LocationComponent): provide convenience constructor for Vector3i
feat(RelevanceSystem): addRelevanceEntity returns the relevant region
chore: update vertex attribute with put(T[] data)
refactor: add test cases for vertex resource and update api with put and replace
feat: add vertex attribute bindings for short and byte
fix(headless-fixes): remove InputSystem and NuiManager from headlesses
test(modules): make com.google.truth assertion library available
build(IntelliJ): add inspections allowing IntelliJ to correct "modifier out of order" infractions
build(server): fix --homedir arg for gradle task `server`
chore(StateMainMenu): include message in toString representation for debugging
fix: Avoid a couple cases where no NUIManager would cause trouble.
feat(octree): Octo tree as chunk's data structure.
build(ci): build using a java 11 toolchain
build: upgrade minimum compatible version to Java 11
feat(extract-subsystems): extract `Context`, `@In`, `InjectionHelper` and `@Share` to Subsystem
refactor(translation): use `ResourceUrn` instead of `SimpleUrn`
fix(engine/rendering): Fix ChunkMeshRenderer listens to wrong deactivate event
feat(THL): ByteBuffer implementation for THL Serialization
feat(i18n): Update Ukrainian locale with current strings
feat(i18n): Update engine settings i18n
chore: remove some slow logging
fix(SystemConfig): ensure thread max limit is never less than one
build(javadoc): disable doclint messages about missing tags
chore: add reactor-extra to dependencies
test: add unitTest target to TypeHandlerLibrary and facades
Revert "build(ci): build using a java 11 toolchain"
build: build using a java 11 toolchain
test(TypeHandlerLibrary): provide a logger during test execution
build: fix mystery Artifactory issue
feat(F3): show process data size and limit
feat: micrometer metrics over JMX
feature(WorkspaceValidationTests): add possible to create workspace-wide tests
feat(MonitoringSubsystem): provide Micrometer gauges for rendering.world
chore: overhaul issue template
chore: reduce logger level for animation-action link on behaviors
perf: remove trove map and added flags to Side
fix(headless-execution): MainMenuState can handle headless now. Correct loadingstate for headless clients.
chore: remove usage of Tesselator for BlockSelectionRenderer
chore: remove deprecated method in Block
feat: implement skinned mesh
feat: add support for skinned Mesh
chore: remove TessellatorHelper
refactor: split out chunk work as a seperate helper class
bugfix: resolve BlockSelectionRenderer
fix: fix game screen goes black bug
chore: add security policy
test(ChunkMeshWorker): initial attempt at using reactor-test
refactor(Chunk): provide default implementations of methods where possible
chore: remove no longer existing CharacterMovement fields from prefabs
doc: update README
feat: add convenience method  PhyiscEngine#recomputeCharacterCollider(entity)
refactor(rendering): factor out MutableChunkMesh
made changes in BlockCommands.java to prevent adding of wrong number â€¦
feat: add ball mesh
chore: Update lwjgl version to 3.3.1
fix: path quirk on an M1 Mac using Azul JDK 11
build(idea): update dictionary and gitignores
fix(SelectionScreen): be more robust in the face of save files with incomplete manifests
chore(StorageManager): typos and minor code cleanups
test: Move ModuleTestingEnvironment to engine-tests
fix(test): set jacoco excludes for engine-test's unitTest and integrationTest tasks
fix(ChunkProcessingPipeline): base thread pool size on available processors
feat: bgfx backend primatives for Mesh
chore: remove unused ByteCodeReflectFactory
fix(Context)!: correct signature of Context.get
feat: InvokingContext injects ::method references with values from the Context
doc: replace IRC link with Discord
build: extract project metrics/analytics to terasology-metrics gradle plugin
security: upgrade dependencies
test: reducing logspam
feat(#4948): restrict default memory settings
chore(#4908): match IntelliJ and Checkstyle formatting rules
build(checkstyle): update to version 10.2, update .idea to match
feat(InjectionHelper): inject() returns the object for chaining
